Title: Kaishain x Sumida Suizokukan Bikkuri! Kai Matsuri CM
Description: ['A ', Kaishain, ' promotion for the Sumida Aquarium featuring a exhibit that has the species of animals the ', Kaishain, ' characters are modeled after: clione, octopus, and various shellfish. The exhibit will run from Saturday, March 18, 2017 - Sunday May 7, 2017.']
